ctx: intros a nZa p q canon_p canon_q.
induction p as [| a' p' IHp].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : Term A n nZa : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a q : list (Term A n) canon_p : canonical A0 eqA ltM nil canon_q : canonical A0 eqA ltM q Unable to unify "canonical A0 eqA ltM q" with "canonical A0 eqA ltM (pO A n)".

ctx: intros a nZa p q canon_p canon_q.
induction p as [| a' p' IHp].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : Term A n nZa : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a a' : Term A n p', q : list (Term A n) canon_p : canonical A0 eqA ltM (a' :: p') canon_q : canonical A0 eqA ltM q IHp : canonical A0 eqA ltM p' -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (list_rec (fun _ : list (Term A n) => list (Term A n)) (pO A n) (fun (a1 : Term A n) (_ rec : list (Term A n)) => pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (divpf a nZa (mults multA (n:=n) a1 q)) rec) p') Unable to unify "olist ?M2297 (spminusf ?M2285 ?M2286 ?M2287 ?M2288 ?M2290 ?M2291 ?M2292 ?M2293 ?M2295 ?M2296 ?M2297 ?M2298 ?M2300 ?M2301 ?M2302 ?M2303 ?M2304) /\\ nZterm ?M2286 ?M2288 (spminusf ?M2285 ?M2286 ?M2287 ?M2288 ?M2290 ?M2291 ?M2292 ?M2293 ?M2295 ?M2296 ?M2297 ?M2298 ?M2300 ?M2301 ?M2302 ?M2303 ?M2304)" with "olist (A:=A) ltM (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (divpf a nZa (mults multA (n:=n) a' q)) (list_rec (fun _ : list (Term A n) => list (Term A n)) (pO A n) (fun (a1 : Term A n) (_ rec : list (Term A n)) => pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (divpf a nZa (mults multA (n:=n) a1 q)) rec) p')) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (divpf a nZa (mults multA (n:=n) a' q)) (list_rec (fun _ : list (Term A n) => list (Term A n)) (pO A n) (fun (a1 : Term A n) (_ rec : list (Term A n)) => pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (divpf a nZa (mults multA (n:=n) a1 q)) rec) p'))".

original: intros a nZa p q canon_p canon_q. unfold Dmult. induction p as [| a' p' IHp]. - simpl. apply canon_q. - simpl. apply canonical_spminusf_full; auto.
